subtitle:
A simple salad that makes a great starter to a main meal. 
Smoked succulent, tender trout lends itself to this Thai style recipe.

method.text: Start by making the dressing. Warm together sugar, vinegar, lime juice, fish sauce and ginger until sugar has dissolved. Set aside to cool. Stir in the two oils.
Flake the smoked trout and place in a large bowl. Slice the mango. Add to trout with onions, garlic, chilli and coriander.
Pour over the dressing and serve garnished with the cashews.

title: Hot and sour smoked trout salad with cashews
